articles.author: CSmith1919
articles.title: After Hoffenheim win, Thomas Tuchel says Eric Dier can help Bayern Munich play a back three - Bavarian Football Works
articles.content:
Bayern Munich coach Thomas Tuchel stopped reveling in his teams 3-0 victory over Hoffenheim just long enough to drop some thoughts on new defender Eric Dier. 
He will train with us tomorrow. Hes in … [+1003 chars]

articles.title: Thomas Tuchel and Harry Kane react to Bayern's 3-0 win over Hoffenheim | ESPN FC - ESPN UK
articles.description: Thomas Tuchel and Harry Kane field questions after Bayern Munich's 3-0 win over TSG Hoffenheim.----Subscribe to ESPN UK: http://bit.ly/1oGUzVAFollow ESPN UK ...
